name: Spot The Differences Party!
overview: Find the differences solo or with family/friends. Who is the quickest spotter? The most complete difference game on Wii U! Play solo or with up to 3 friends, and see who is the quickest spotter! Specs: From 1 to 4 players. 360 pictures, 3,600 differences to find! Game modes: Solo game: play on the GamePad, or on your TV with a Wii Remote. Hints and extra times will help you when you are stuck. Synchronous multiplayer game using the GamePad and Wii Remotes. Turn-based multiplayer game on the GamePad with synchronous replay: compare your performance with your friends after each turn!
